GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v4.19.273
GSD.description:
IB/hfi1: Restore allocated resources on failed copyout

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.273 by commit 00d9e212b8a39e6ffcf31b9d2e503d2bf6009d45, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit f404ca4c7ea8e650ba09ba87c71c7a89c865d5be. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: IB/hfi1: Restore allocated resources on failed copyout
